<h1 align="center">
  App
</h1>

Mockup with react

This is the branch to _stage_ commits for gh-pages branch

Instructions:

1. git checkout ghp
1. Go <a href="https://www.gatsbyjs.org/docs/how-gatsby-works-with-github-pages/">here</a> for details
1. `npm run deploy`
1. `git checkout gh-pages`
1. `npm run deploy`
1. updates will automatically be pushed to the `gh-pages` branch
1. go back to `ghp` branch with `git checkout ghp`
1. clean up all the shit that happened, `git reset --hard`, `git clean -fxd`
